user_query: I'm visiting Paris next month and I want to explore the city's vibrant cocktail scene. Can you recommend some popular cocktail recipes along with their detailed instructions? Furthermore, I'd like to know if there are any upcoming events related to my favorite artist, whose ID is '567072', so I can plan my trip accordingly.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of popular cocktail recipes along with detailed instructions.
Check for upcoming events related to the artist with ID '567072'.
